short_summary: The Minister of National defence desires to procure items for two locations.
description: Detailed list of items to procure, quantities, and other relevant details.
tags: Vehicular Cab, Body and Frame Structural Components
full_summary:
# Spring Assembly Leaf Tender Announcement

**Publication Details**

- **Publication Date**: August 30, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 11, 2022, at 14:00 hrs
- **Solicitation Number**: W8486-238715/A

**Contract Details**

- **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
- **Contracting Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada
- **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence

**Notice**

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for spring assembly leaf components. The requirement is for the items listed below, which are to be delivered to the following locations:

- **Item 1:**
  - GSIN/NIBS: 2510
  - NSN/NNO: 2510-00-736-8628
  - Description: Spring Assembly, Leaf - MKT/ Ressort à lames
  - Quantity: 20
  - Destination: Montreal

- **Item 2:**
  - GSIN/NIBS: 2510
  - NSN/NNO: 2510-00-736-8628
  - Description: Spring Assembly, Leaf - MKT/ Ressort à lames
  - Quantity: 20
  - Destination: Edmonton

- **Item 3:**
  - GSIN/NIBS: 2510
  - NSN/NNO: 2510-00-741-1042
  - Description: Aux Spring Assembly, Leaf MKT / Ressort à lames
  - Quantity: 20
  - Destination: Montreal

- **Item 4:**
  - GSIN/NIBS: 2510
  - NSN/NNO: 2510-00-741-1042
  - Description: Aux Spring Assembly, Leaf MKT / Ressort à lames
  - Quantity: 20
  - Destination: Edmonton

Bidders are required to submit proposals electronically. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Bidders must submit their bids by email only to DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca.

**Documents**

Tender documents are available on the Canada Buys website. The following documents are relevant to this tender:
